lab.name: SARCS Lab
lab.fullName: Sustainable, Advanced and Robust Computing Systems
lab.mission: The SARCS Laboratory is dedicated to advancing the frontiers of computer architecture, hardware-software co-design, and emerging computing paradigms. Our research spans in-memory computing, RISC-V architectures, hardware accelerators, and AI systems, with a focus on developing efficient, scalable, and sustainable computing solutions for next-generation applications.
address: Center for VLSI and Embedded Systems Technologies,
International Institute of Information Technology Hyderabad
